sentence.Network_en: We gave the watchword, and the sentinel let us pass.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们说出口令, 哨兵就把我们放过去了.

sentence.Network_en: Today the watchword is " Learn through playing ".
sentence.Network_cn: 当今的格言是 “ 寓学习于娱乐之中 ”.

violent热烈的；极端的watchword口令；暗号；口号；标语wast荒度；毁坏；浪费；耗损.

list.abs: Employability and multi skilling became the new watchwords of employment ., 可雇性和多技能化已成为时新的就业口号.
He did not know the watchword ., 他不知道口令.
Prudence and discretion are the new watchwords ., 谨小慎微是新口号.
Let that rather be the your watchword , I am my brothers keeper ., 让这成为你的格言 , 我是我兄弟的守护者.

entry.def: Someone's watchword is a word or phrase that sums up their attitude or approach to a particular subject or to things in general.

example.ex: Caution has been one of Mr Allan's watchwords...
example.tran: “小心谨慎”是艾伦先生的座右铭。

example.ex: You don't have to deny yourself everything that's nice when you're pregnant. Moderation is the watchword.
example.tran: 怀孕时没有必要抗拒一切平时喜欢的东西。关键是要适度。

means.word_mean: 1. a slogan used to rally support for a cause;
2. a secret word or phrase known only to a restricted group;

auth_sentence.content: Flexibility and adaptability has not really been our watchword!
auth_sentence.res_content: Flexibility and adaptability has not really been our watchword!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flexibility and adaptability has not really been our watchword!

auth_sentence.content: Muslims prayed alongside Christians and the watchword was mutual respect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Muslims prayed alongside Christians and the watchword was mutual respect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Muslims prayed alongside Christians and the watchword was mutual respect.

auth_sentence.content: Personal service looks set to remain the airline's watchword.
auth_sentence.res_content: Personal service looks set to remain the airline's watchword.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Personal service looks set to remain the airline's watchword.

sentences.en: Today the watchword is “Learn through playing”.
sentences.cn: 当今的格言是“寓学习于娱乐之中”。
